historical:
Effective Date

Pub. L. 109-432, § 404(b), provided as follows:

"The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as if included in the enactment of the DC School Choice Incentive Act of 2003."

DC CODE § 38-1851.06

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Grants for Tuition to Attend Primary and Secondary Schools in the District. [Repealed]
